column1:
The Duchess of Cambridge asked how many of the calls reflected people's mental health issues. Mr Emmerson said: 'Quite a large volume. People with mental health issues are more concerned about coronavirus and how to manage that. #coronavirus
#DuchessofCambridgepic.twitter.com/8pMWIuBgfj
